original_text: He that is wounded in the stones, or hath his privy member cut off, shall not enter into the congregation of the Lord.
korean_text: 고환이 상한 자나 음경이 잘린 자는 여호와의 총회에 들어오지 못하리라

sentences.original_text: He that is wounded in the stones
or hath his privy member cut off
shall not enter into the congregation of the Lord
